title: How can I withdraw from my MySaveUp by BPI account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Can I open a #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30335443503385-Can-I-open-a-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)
- [What is the interest rate in #MySaveUp by BPI?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242240950809-What-is-the-interest-rate-in-MySaveUp-by-BPI)

- [How can I withdraw from my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242279662233-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)

- [How can I close my #MySaveUp by BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30242463562905-How-can-I-close-my-MySaveUp-by-BPI-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Before making a withdrawal from your #MySaveUp by BPI account to your GCash Wallet, check your [Wallet and Transaction Limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits).

To withdraw funds from your #MySaveUp by BPI account, follow these steps:

1. On your #MySaveUp by BPI dashboard, select **Withdraw**
2. Enter the amount you want to withdraw > **Next**
3. Review and confirm the amount > **Confirm**
4. Enter the 6-digit authentication code sent to your GCash-registered mobile number > **Confirm**

You'll see a confirmation page once the withdrawal is successful. Funds will be credited to your GCash Wallet from your #MySaveUp by BPI account in **real time**.

Note:

Withdrawal of funds from your #MySaveUp by BPI account **will NOT** affect your wallet limits.
